titleStmt.title: The laboryouse iourney [and] serche of Iohan Leylande, for Englandes antiquitees geuen of hym as a newe yeares gyfte to Kynge Henry the viij. in the. xxxvij. yeare of his reygne, with declaracyons enlarged: by Iohan Bale
titleStmt.author: Leland, John, 1506?-1552.
Bale, John, 1495-1563. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Mierdman for John Bale] To be sold [by R. Foster] in fletestrete at the signe of the Croune next vnto the whyte Fryears gate,

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads "Emprented at London by Iohan Bale, Anno. M.D.XLIX." Actual function of Bale as publisher, and Foster's name, from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: fletestrete at the signe of the Croune next vnto the whyte Fryears gate
